text: Melvin R. Hutchins (November 22, 1928 â€“ December 19, 2018) was an American basketball player. He played professionally in the National Basketball Association (NBA) from 1951 to 1958 when he played for the Milwaukee Hawks, Fort Wayne Pistons and New York Knicks. He was born in Sacramento, California. Hutchins died in 2018 in Encinitas, California from complications of Alzheimer's disease at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in California Category:New York Knicks players Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Detroit Pistons players Category:Sportspeople from California
title: Mel Hutchins
